## MandeInstance.patch() method

Sends a PATCH request to the given url.

**Signature:**

```typescript
patch<T = unknown, R extends ResponseAsTypes = 'json'>(data?: any, options?: Options<R>): MandeResponse<T, R>;
```

## Example


```js
users.patch('2', { name: 'Eduardo' }).then(user => {
  // do something
})
```
